colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B (ZHES SOGS THUN MONGS PA DANG, THUN MONGS MA YIN PA BLA MA YI DAM RNAL 'BYOR MA RNAMS KYIS BYIN GYIS RLABSS SHING DNGOS GRUB STZOL BA DANG, MKHA' 'GRO CHOS BSRUNG RNAMS KYIS SPRIN @017A *, ,BZHIN DU BSDUS NAS BSRUNG ZHING 'GROGS PA DANG, BDE BA CHEN PO RGYUD LA SKYE BA SOGS PHAN YON BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA STE, BLA MA GONG GRUB CHEN DAM PA RNAMS KYIS THOD PA DAM RDZAS SU 'CHANG BAS MCHOG GI DNGOS GRUB BSGRUB PA'I NUS PA SKYES PA SOGS YON TAN DPAG TU MED PA YIN PAS RNAL 'BYOR BA'I DAM TSIG GI RDZAS SO, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG GNAS THOD PA'I RIN PO CHE'I, ,BRTAG THABS BCAD 'DOR BYA'I MTSAN NYID DANG, SNGON BYUNG LO RGYUS DANG BCAS DPE CHA RNAMS, ,RGYUD LDAN DAM PA'I LEGS BSHAD 'DUG NA YANG, ,YI GE MTSAMS DANG SBYOR BA RNAMS MDZES SHING, ,NYAG NYOG @017B BSRE BAR YID CHES MI BYUNG BAS, ,YI GE 'GRIGS SHING BSTAN MDOR MA NOR BAR, ,NYI MA'I BSHAD SPRUL CHOS KYI RGYAL BA DE, ,GSUNG BZHIN BLO BZANG MING CAN BRI BA YIS, ,'GRO KUN BDE CHEN DPAL LA LONGS SPYOD SHOG , SHU BHAm, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
